page.title: 04Roebuck Area 1
page.content: peaceful with many{wild birds}and not a great deal of traffic.The few people who live in the area either work on the land or{commute}to the neighbouring towns to work. The Roebuck area is predominately a farming area with a few isolated farmhouses.A number of these buildings are no longer working farms and have been recently bought and renovated by people who wish to live in the countryside but whose livelihood is not in farming.Of the farms remaining few now keep dairy cows for which the area was once important.They now rent out many of the fields for{horses. { } The hamlet called {Top o' th' {Meadows}consists of about ten stone cottages all of which have been renovated and are now most likely to
